product_name: Bern Watts Two-Tone Multisport Helmet - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The vented Bern Watts Two-Tone multisport helmet offers protection with a nod to skate style, and is perfect for everyday use in any weather, from snowplay to riding your bike or skateboard. Thin-shell molded ABS shell with expanded polystyrene (EPS) hard foam interior provides high-impact protection with a low-profile shape and built-in visor. Meets ASTM F 2040 and EN 1077B standards for snow and ski, CPSC and EN 1078 standards for bike and skate. Easily adapt your helmet to the season with the Bern interchangeable cold- and warm-weather liners and accessories, not included. Includes removable winter liner for extra warmth. Closeout.
short_description: The vented Bern Watts Two-Tone multisport helmet offers protection with a nod to skate style, and is perfect for everyday use in any weather, from snowplay to riding your bike or skateboard.
